For those who are confused as fuck: He is in a relationship with his real mother at the end of the story. It's a happy ending for all. The person he refers to as 'Mom' is his aunt dressing up as his mother, whereas the person he refers to as 'Mother' is his real mother. So at the end when he said 'Mom' ended the relationship, it's because the aunt moved away to be with the contract husband. Also, note that in the final conversation between the mother and aunt, the mother stated her relationship with the son has only just started, basically confirming that the son hooked up with his real mother.

Something to add. She signed the agreement with the random guy as she was already pregnant from yuusei and needed someone to take care of her and she also needed a cover story to tell her daughter nagisa how she got pregnant obviously

Tldr: Kyouko is his biological mother. Kyouko accepted yuusei feelings and thus his aunt ended her relationship with yuusei since he already has his real mother and partly she was moving awat. Nagisa his cousin and half sister (same father) seems  to fall in love with yuusei and his aunt basically signed a marriage agreement with a guy to take care of her for one year

@murasame, you are wrong about the fake marriage part. Kyouko yuusei biological mother was in love with the aunt husband. In order to prevent a scandal from people mistaking her from going out with a stranger, the husband divorced the aunt and married Kyouko. The scandal was not because she got pregnant and needed a cover story. It was also good since they both loved each other. There was no fake marriage. The aunt basically agreed to do so in exchange for her lavish lifestyle. Kyouko only after marrying with the husband in the short period of 5 years got pregnant with a child. The child grows up to be yuusei. As for the craving part, we didn't really know about it since the start of the series already showed him lusting for his aunt dressed as his mother looks having sex with him. She did implied that she raised yuusei as her own and used him to take revenge. She may have influenced him in some way to like his real mother deeply.

So I think i understood it: the Aunt is "mom" and His real mother is "mother". His Aunt explains their story in the car to the stranger. Nagisa is his step sister and his cousin cause they have the same father. His Aunt basically made his mother crave him to get revenge for stealing her husband. The fake marriage is cause she got pregnant from him to cover it up so she can say that the child is from her fake husband. aT the end it´ s said that  "mom" ended their relationship so he s talking about his aunt sicne she moved away. So to sum it up: He ends up with his real mother and his step sister cousin , his Aunt moves away and raises his child.
